name: Akhara Mach. & Electric Works

description: Akhara Mach. and Electric Works manufact
overview:
Capacity expansions and infrastructure improvements. This high level of service comes by design, from hard work and continual investment in people and systems. Akhara Mach. & Electric Works has made significant capital improvements in our production capabilities to strengthen our position as the industry’s leader in customer service, accuracy, lead time and on-time delivery. All of our products are manufactured in an environmentally certified, state-of-the-art facility which now includes the most advanced production equipment in the industry.

We understand and appreciate your commitment to diligently meeting schedules, and we conscientiously strive to ensure that our material arrives complete and on-time to support your efforts. This is not just talk. It is service that you deserve - 96% of our orders arrive on-time with no back orders. This level of service makes Akhara Mach. & Electric Works the best in our industry.
